title: When you go too ham, but your ally saves you

I don't know, Tristana almost literally has a move designed to ham with
But Vayne's love to go ham and Vayne is Batman.
no, vayne isn't batman, vayne is cancer.

Did this with {{champion:429}} {{champion:53}} lane. My support was in tryhard mode and forced me to ult to save him.
I don't know what y'all are saying, but I say every person who gets carried away with every person who has to watch their backs.

{{champion:412}} : Now my lantern is on cooldown so I can't sa--
{{champion:18}} : RIGGLE LET'S GO #2Cute2Care
What is this thing you call "too ham"? I don't think I have ever heard of such a thing before.
{{champion:89}} I know I haven't.
Ham pretty much means going commando.
What does wearing no underwear under your clothing have to do with pork products?
It doesn't actually mean the food ham and no underwear.   H.A.M:  Hard As a Mother******

Are you just trying my patience or are you actually this dense? If it's the first, good job. You succeeded. If it's the latter, BRILLIANT! move. You missed the joke. It went a couple of million light-years above your head.
:/  What?
anyone else staring at this trying to figure out where it beings and ends? I'm personally thinking it's where superman tosses him into the air.
Actually, Superman catches Batman. But I can understand the confusion. This gif is pretty clean.
